name: Han's Heavy Blaster Pistol (V)
Lore: 'BlasTech DL-44 heavy pistol. Short range, but relatively powerful. Carries energy for 25 shots. Illegal or restricted on most systems.',
Text: 'Deploy on Han (except TK-422), even as a ''react.'' May target a character or creature for free. Draw destiny. Target hit, its forfeit = 0, and opponent loses 1 Force if destiny +1 > defense value. Once during your control phase, may fire using 1 Force.',
